snippet: An unidentified attacker shot and killed a deputy minister of industry on Sunday, in the first reported assassination of a senior national official in Iran in years.
abstract: Unidentified attacker shoots and kills Safdar Rahmat Abadi, Iranian deputy minister of industry, in  first reported assassination of a senior national official in Iran in years.
lead_paragraph: An unidentified attacker shot and killed a deputy minister of industry on Sunday, in the first reported assassination of a senior national official in Iran in years.

headline.main: An Iranian Deputy Minister Is Assassinated in Tehran
headline.print_headline: An Iranian Deputy Minister Is Assassinated in Tehran
